title: The Red Badge of Courage (Part 12)
description: Henry and Wilson bravely lead a charge that starts well but falters short of the objective. Henry seizes the Union flag when the color sergeant is mortally wounded at his side.
meta: Use the Reading strategy of retelling to better understand a text
